item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

Wintercanon:

Shut up. No one criticising you is going to use your CMS, they’ll download a professional one. Your code, while will suit your needs, will be riffled with insecurities. Just make sure you attribute credits to the author of the art or design you’ve used.

Implying that other CMSes don’t have holes.
Anyhow security checks of the CMS are done by a few guys over @P0wersurge

Also for the people who can not read or have bad eyes. The only thing used is the menu everything else is done by me and only me.

http://evil-s.deviantart.com/art/Burned-Grunge-Web-UI-KIT-294223921

item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

Okay to set things straight and stop all the butthurt.

The only thing that was not made by me was the menu bar.
You can see that everything else is done by me (images copyrighted to Runescape ofcourse).
None of the code has been leeched, everything is coded by myself. The whole CMS, the design it’s all done by me except the small piece that is the menubar.

All you guys here raging in the thread, I don’t see you guys raging in the server development section saying that all they used is tuts and a downloadable source not made by them. At one point all you guys started downloading a source, went to the tut section and got spoonfed so you could put it into your servers and say omg look at this cool shit i have.

The only thing used that i did not create is the f* menu bar and yet you all find it so frustrating. Go ahead, create your own CMS or template. Will you do it? No. You will just go to this section and download whatever there is on this page and modify the copyright in the footer to your name/server name. So please get of this thread if you are here to bash.

The reason why i keep this thing alive is for the people that still want it. And i know you haters will download it aswell so please shut up or go away.

PS: Why is it that nobody starts saying omg you stole that tutorial from X or the only thing you did was follow this tut. This goes for design as for server development.

Night.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Who cares? This is obviously in development, we can see solid changes from the template that’s downloadable on the site provided. It’s a work in progress based off of something else. The whole point of this board is to show off what you’re doing, and it’s the same concept of the RS2 emulation’s server development board. People take a base to start off with, and they consistently add modifications to it. What’s the difference in what TheAmmoBandit’s doing? Nothing. He took previously designed work, and is adding modifications to it. It doesn’t matter that it’s not written from scratch, he may be just trying to learn the in’s and out’s of CSS and web design. If you’d all stop being so negative, and support the template in progress, it could turn out very nicely.

Read full topic

item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:46, topic:516151”][quote author=TheAmmoBandit link=topic=634410.msg4310662#msg4310662 date=1370687257]

PSD Files and the template itself (coded & non coded) will be available aswell as the GUI system i’ve created.

GUI system i’ve created.

Gui as in not the design but the overal page that is editable trough the admin cp.

Anyhow seeing how these guys get butthurt:

CMS Version release next sunday including:
-Fully Server Integration. (Guides will help for server sided setup)
–Login/register b4play (including 317,PI and 562 deob support currently
–Auto Vote
–Auto Donate
-Forums
-Shoutbox
-Slider
-News System
-Image folder systel or however you want to call it.

Hope all you butthurts are now happy. Also please feel free to contact Evil-S , my friend (not irl ofc) if he’s ok that i modified his PSD GUI and coded it for him
[/quote]
Can you prove that you’ve created such things yourself?[/quote]

Actually yes, unless you find soemthing that proves the opposite

anyhow:

[li]News System has been coded[/li]
